data.name: Black Squad - 1ST YEAR ANNIVERSARY PACKAGE
data.detailed_description:
1ST YEAR ANNIVERSARY PACKAGE!

[PACKAGE LIST]
HNK45C 1ST YEAR ANNIVERSARY // Permanent
1st Year Anniversary Calling card // Permanent
M67 H/G GIFT / 20 D
M18 SMOKE GIFT / 20 D
150,000 Gold
2,500 Medal

* One DLC per account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain*, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows 7 64bit
  • 處理器: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0
  • 儲存空間: 7 GB 可用空間
pc_requirements.recommended:
建議配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows 7 64bit
  • 處理器: Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0
  • 儲存空間: 7 GB 可用空間
